name: 23Supremos
description: Luis is a boy who comes from a lineage of adventurers who, thanks to their special abilities, developed and passed down for generations, are recognized as "Los Supremos." However, Luis is a special case as he has not been blessed with any skills. For this reason he was exiled to guard the ancient and forgotten catacombs of the city. The catacombs are inhabited by wild creatures, which is why they were ceded to "Los Supremos", to guard the entrance to the city; the entrance is tightly closed by a metal door to which only "Los Supremos" have access. Although over the years the details of the catacombs have been forgotten, until we do not even know how many floors it has exactly, it is only known that the first room on the second floor was used as a storage room for the family. After a few days, while Luis was cleaning the storage room, he dropped the key to the door through a pipe with unknown whereabouts, so now he must explore the catacombs to find the key and get out of the labyrinth. Will Luis manage to acquire his skills while looking for the key? Will he find another way out of the catacombs?
